scanner.placeholder: Search product name or SKU, or paste a barcode...

quickTips.title: Quick Tips
quickTips.subtitle: How to use the scanner
quickTips.step1: Connect a barcode scanner or use your camera
quickTips.step2: Scan the product barcode or QR code
quickTips.step4: Proceed to add or remove stock

scanMobile.title: Scan with Mobile
scanMobile.subtitle: Point your mobile app camera at the QR code or barcode below to perform quick stock-out actions from the mobile app.
scanMobile.tipsTitle: Tips for scanning with a mobile phone
scanMobile.tip1: Open the mobile app and go to the scanner section.
scanMobile.tip2: Point the camera steadily at the QR code or barcode and allow it to autofocus.
scanMobile.tip3: Ensure good lighting and avoid glare on glossy labels.
scanMobile.tip4: If scanning a barcode, align it horizontally across the camera frame.
